resources.string: You will a shown a sentence with few blank(s).
Some possible answers will be shown below it.
Tap on what you think is the correct answer to fill in the space(s).
For each correct answer, you get a +1 score.
You will be shown a multiple choice question.
Four possible answers will be shown below it.
Tap on what you think is the correct answer.
For each correct answer, you get a +1 score.
